title: Vertex AI customers can generate media with Imagen 3 and Veo.
description: Google Cloud customers can now use Imagen 3 and Veo to create images and videos for their businesses. Starting next week, all Google Cloud customers will be able to acce…
excerpt: Google Cloud customers can now use Imagen 3 and Veo to create images and videos for their businesses. Starting next week, all Google Cloud customers will be able to acce…
text: Google Cloud customers can now use Imagen 3 and Veo to create images and videos for their businesses. Starting next week, all Google Cloud customers will be able to access Imagen 3 on Vertex AI. Imagen 3 generates high-quality images based on text prompts. Customers will get access to new tools that can help them edit and customize images generated by Imagen 3.Veo, which generates video based on text or image prompts, is now available to Vertex AI customers in private preview. This makes Google Cloud the first cloud provider of its scale to offer a generative AI service that takes still images and transforms them into videos.To find out more, head to the Google Cloud blog.
html:
Google Cloud customers can now use Imagen 3 and Veo to create images and videos for their businesses.

Starting next week, all Google Cloud customers will be able to access Imagen 3 on Vertex AI. Imagen 3 generates high-quality images based on text prompts. Customers will get access to new tools that can help them edit and customize images generated by Imagen 3.

Veo, which generates video based on text or image prompts, is now available to Vertex AI customers in private preview. This makes Google Cloud the first cloud provider of its scale to offer a generative AI service that takes still images and transforms them into videos.

To find out more, head to the Google Cloud blog.
